section.section: This section applies to a development project to expand a marina that historically operated as a working marina for the sole purpose of supporting aquaculture or seafood operations.
This section does not apply to a development project to expand a marina if the existing or expanded marina is used to allow a person to moor, dock, or store recreational or pleasure vessels.
The license authorized under paragraph (1) of this subsection may authorize dredging to improve navigational access to the marina or marina facility operations.
